entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rainbow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
